data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 306 believers in Au Cap that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Au Cap, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Au Cap, Seychelles to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Au Cap, Seychelles today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 306 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Au Cap do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Au Cap a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary:
the state of Au Cap, Seychelles has a population of 4,400.

We estimate Au Cap has 306 people who might know Jesus, 3,926 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 168 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Au Cap to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
